ComicInfo.Summary:
Victoria and her friends have faced The Emerald City under the rulership of the Tin Man, the descendants of the Cowardly Lion, but how will they handle a group of very short, and very unruly Munchkins? Hidden in the forests for decades, can Victoria enlist their help, and what secrets hide within their village? Don't miss the latest chapter in this colorful interpretation of Oz through a SteamPunk lens.
Note: The digital edition (7/17/2013) of this issue was released two weeks before the print edition (7/31/2013).
